main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects in Nashville, Tennessee, from November 5 to November 6, 1954.
interesting points: A round, flaming white object was observed flying with trailing fire and smoke at an elevation of 40Â°., One witness described a shiny aluminum disc-shaped object approximately 50 feet in diameter., The disc was observed for about 2-3 minutes before disappearing from view., A silver oval-shaped object was reported hovering and oscillating at 1,000 to 2,000 feet., A bright yellow light was seen moving slowly across the sky before hovering and then rapidly disappearing.
sighted object: Unidentified flying objects including a round flaming object, a shiny aluminum disc, and a bright yellow light.
witness description: A theatre manager and several employees reported the sightings.
